---
published: true
id: 8
title: "All things startup"
subtitle: We act as external legal in-house counsels for start-ups and take care of their day-to-day legal needs.
img: "/images/practice-areas/startup.jpg"
imageBlurUrl: "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
url: "#8"
---

We provide handholding to start-ups in their early years mostly on:
   
  - Structuring and providing assistance for registration of new companies
  - Drafting various SOPs on compliances
  - Guide on labour and employment related issues
  - Draft, review and negotiate on contracts for the business. We also train business teams to sensitise them on contract terms and help them to act as the first point of contact for negotiations with third parties
  - Assist in implementing tax and insurance SOPs for companies and also assist in filing and litigation as and when required.
  - Guide and assist on brand protection mainly with registering of trademark, designs and patents
  - Assist in company secretarial compliances in order to ensure that the company is in compliance   with existing applicable regulations
  - Standardising internal policies
  - Public relations strategy
  - Assist in hiring the right resource for your specific needs
  - Advising on funding strategies
  - Provide training on various compliance related subjects like PoSH, anti-bribery, ethics and compliance, legal basics et

We act as external legal in-house counsels for start-ups and take care of their day-to-day legal needs.
